content.question: Which of the following best explains why the  Bugs  class does not compile?

choices.label: The return type of the  getPopulation  method should be  void.
The  getPopulation  method should have at least one parameter.
The variable  population  is not declared inside the  getPopulation  method.
In the  getPopulation  method, the variable  population  should be returned instead of  p.

content.answer: In the  getPopulation  method, the variable  population  should be returned instead of  p.

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
